meanings.sent1: The reusable bag can be used multiple times.
meanings.sent2: I bought a reusable water bottle to help the environment.
meanings.sent3: The reusable container told the disposable ones a joke.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and reusable as a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The concept of time travel in the movie was as reusable as a magic potion.

meanings.definition: Capable of being used more than once.
meanings.sent1: The reusable cloth napkin is eco-friendly.
meanings.sent2: She prefers using reusable utensils instead of plastic ones.
meanings.sent3: The reusable pen made friends with the refillable pencil.
meanings.sent4: His advice was as valuable and reusable as a timeless treasure map.
meanings.sent5: The idea of friendship is as reusable as a favorite book you can read over and over again.
